description:
Crypt of the NecroDancer is a roguelike rhythm game. Move to the beat in an ever-changing dungeon while fighting
skeletons, dragons, and rapping moles. Descend into the crypt to defeat the NecroDancer and claim the Golden Lute!

1.0.0.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v1.0.0

1.0.1.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v1.0.1

1.0.2.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v1.0.2

1.0.3.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v1.0.3

v0.1.0.description:
Initial release of an updated Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago apworld and mod.

Includes:
- Crypt of the NecroDancer apworld
- Crypt of the NecroDancer YAML template.

Download the associated Archipelago Redux Mod from either the [ModIO page](https://mod.io/g/crypt/m/ap#description) or the in-game mod browser.

Please see the [setup file](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/blob/crypt-of-the-necrodancer/worlds/cotnd/docs/setup_en.md) for getting started.

Also note that this is in an **Alpha** state and will likely be buggy.

Please inform me of any issues through the associated [Crypt of the NecroDancer channel in the Archipelago Discord](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1192775219740422176) or through [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/issues).

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/41cf030f-05e0-4ce0-bd5f-7e29d3545877

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/75149456-4028-4c5e-83d8-ce0b60f68a01
v0.1.0.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v0.1.0

v0.1.1.description:
### Changes
- Updates setup guide text to include references to downloading the Archipelago Redux Mod
- Updates options text to further clarify that Synchrony **is** required to run this Archipelago integration.
- Adds support for Flatpack NecroDancer data directory in the NecroDancer client.

Please see the [setup file](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/blob/crypt-of-the-necrodancer/worlds/cotnd/docs/setup_en.md) for getting started.

Please inform me of any issues through the associated [Crypt of the NecroDancer channel in the Archipelago Discord](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1192775219740422176) or through [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/issues).
v0.1.1.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v0.1.1

v0.1.2.description:
### Changes
- Removes Magic Apple, Magic Cheese, Magic Drumstick, Magic Ham, and Cursed Potion from the Base item pool, as they're Amplified.
- Removes No Return, Hard, Phasing, Randomizer, Mystery modes from the Base item pool, as they're Amplified. Adds conditional for removing these modes if included in the YAML without having "Amplified" enabled.

Please see the [setup file](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/blob/crypt-of-the-necrodancer/worlds/cotnd/docs/setup_en.md) for getting started.

Please inform me of any issues through the associated [Crypt of the NecroDancer channel in the Archipelago Discord](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1192775219740422176) or through [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/issues).
v0.1.2.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v0.1.2

v0.2.0.description:
### Changes
- Adds Locked Lobby NPCs. By default, there is one lobby NPC in a cage per zone. On APWorld generation, the NPCs are randomized and given one of the following key requirements: Shop Golden Key (60%), Dig Golden Key (30%), and Glass Golden Key (10%). Each type is required despite the weights. This affects progression as Merlin is one of the locked lobby npcs, and by proxy, her shop is locked until she is acquired.
- Adds Randomized Lobby NPCs. Instead of unlocking the NPC after saving them, you will receive a randomized unlock.
- Adds Zones goal. This goal makes it so that you need to complete X separate zones in order to achieve the victory condition. X is identified by `zones_goal_clear` in the provided YAML file.

Please see the [setup file](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/blob/crypt-of-the-necrodancer/worlds/cotnd/docs/setup_en.md) for getting started.

Please inform me of any issues through the associated [Crypt of the NecroDancer channel in the Archipelago Discord](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1192775219740422176) or through [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/issues).
v0.2.0.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v0.2.0

v0.2.1.description:
### Changes
- Adds support for mod disconnects. This permits the client to properly disconnect on exiting Crypt of the NecroDancer.
- Adds Permanent Health upgrades to the item pool. As per vanilla, there are three, meaning 3 additional health for your AP runs.

Please see the [setup file](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/blob/crypt-of-the-necrodancer/worlds/cotnd/docs/setup_en.md) for getting started.

Please inform me of any issues through the associated [Crypt of the NecroDancer channel in the Archipelago Discord](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1192775219740422176) or through [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/issues).
v0.2.1.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v0.2.1

v0.2.2.description:
Note: I've decided to switch the version number strategy to something more reminiscent of an alpha. The previous versions have been updated with the new versioning strategy.

### Changes
- Adds trap items, along with options to set their weights and percentage in replacing filler items.
- Fixes issue causing All Zones checks to be completely removed from the All Zones goal, preventing the victory condition unless the player completed the world in one sitting.

A YAML file is provided with the updated options config.

Please see the [setup file](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/blob/crypt-of-the-necrodancer/worlds/cotnd/docs/setup_en.md) for getting started.

Please inform me of any issues through the associated [Crypt of the NecroDancer channel in the Archipelago Discord](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1192775219740422176) or through [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/issues).
v0.2.2.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v0.2.2

v0.3.0.description:
### Changes
- Adds shop stock items and associated rules to increase the sphere requirements and make progression a bit more meaningful
- Adds generation creating a list of hint locations for use by the Hintmaster (replaces Bossmaster in name only)
- Adds per-level zone checks option (on by default) and associated checks.
- Replaces Weaponmaster with Codex and associated checks (Dragon Lore, How to Get Away with Murder, etc.)

A YAML file is provided with the updated options config.

Please see the [setup file](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/blob/crypt-of-the-necrodancer/worlds/cotnd/docs/setup_en.md) for getting started.

Please inform me of any issues through the associated [Crypt of the NecroDancer channel in the Archipelago Discord](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1192775219740422176) or through [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/issues).
v0.3.0.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v0.3.0

v0.3.1.description:
### Changes
- Fixes Deathlink status not sending correctly on initial state message to the Archipelago Redux mod (was always sending true)

Please see the [setup file](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/blob/crypt-of-the-necrodancer/worlds/cotnd/docs/setup_en.md) for getting started.

Please inform me of any issues through the associated [Crypt of the NecroDancer channel in the Archipelago Discord](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1192775219740422176) or through [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/issues).
v0.3.1.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v0.3.1

v0.3.2.description:
### Changes
- Adds `include_codex_checks` option to the YAML and separates Codex location checks from `locked_lobby_npcs` conditional.
- Fixes spoiler log writing causing world generation failure when `locked_lobby_npcs` is disabled in the YAML.
- Fixes generation failure when `per_level_zone_clears` is disabled in the YAML.

A YAML file is provided with the updated options config.

Please see the [setup file](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/blob/crypt-of-the-necrodancer/worlds/cotnd/docs/setup_en.md) for getting started.

Please inform me of any issues through the associated [Crypt of the NecroDancer channel in the Archipelago Discord](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1192775219740422176) or through [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/issues).
v0.3.2.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v0.3.2

v0.3.3.description:
### Changes
- Adds support for the Shovel Knight dlc and associated character item + checks
- Separates story boss checks from generic boss zone checks
  - This means that `Cadence - Zone 4 - Boss` will be completed with All Zones Zone 4 Boss or the single Zone 4 NecroDancer. Checking `Cadence - Zone 4 - Boss` will unlock Cadence Zone 5 instead of requiring `Cadence - NecroDancer`.
 - Fix codex locations being disabled preventing generation from broken access rules.

A YAML file is provided with the updated options config.

Please see the [setup file](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/blob/crypt-of-the-necrodancer/worlds/cotnd/docs/setup_en.md) for getting started.

Please inform me of any issues through the associated [Crypt of the NecroDancer channel in the Archipelago Discord](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1192775219740422176) or through [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/issues).
v0.3.3.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v0.3.3

v0.4.0.description:
### Changes
- Rewrites the client entirely, replacing it with a TCP Server that opens on a localhost port upon connecting to the Archipelago server.
- Changes default YAML options: Modes goal, 8 characters required for All Zones goal, 40 zones required for zones goal.
- Fixes up some YAML text to make it a little less confusing.
- Edits setup file to support the new `scriptWhitelist` property requirement.

Please see the [setup file](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/blob/crypt-of-the-necrodancer/worlds/cotnd/docs/setup_en.md) for getting started.

Please inform me of any issues through the associated [Crypt of the NecroDancer channel in the Archipelago Discord](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1192775219740422176) or through [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/issues).
v0.4.0.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer Archipelago v0.4.0

v0.4.1.description:
### Changes
- Vendors the Python versions 3.11, 3.12, and 3.13 of `zstandard` for Linux and Windows operating systems to support actually opening up and using the Crypt of the NecroDancer client

Please see the [setup file](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/blob/crypt-of-the-necrodancer/worlds/cotnd/docs/setup_en.md) for getting started.

Please inform me of any issues through the associated [Crypt of the NecroDancer channel in the Archipelago Discord](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1192775219740422176) or through [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/lastingParadox/Archipelago-CotND/issues).
